directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat. Add the fettuccine pasta, and cook until al dente, 10 to 12 minutes; drain.
Toss pasta with olive oil, red bell pepper, baby spinach, and white Cheddar. Season with black pepper. Good hot or cold.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Group Effort Pasta
